question: India commenced the Civil Disobedience Movement with which of the following?
option3: No Tax campaign by Sardar Patel
option4: The unfurling of the national flag by Nehru
explanation: The Salt March, also known as the Dandi March and the Dandi Satyagraha, was an act of nonviolent civil disobedience in colonial India led by Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi to produce salt from the seawater in the coastal village of Dandi, as was the practice of the local populace until British officials.
